pr_title: API Gateway and web data schema (customer-facing)

timeline.message: Move api gateway directory under services and update artifactids
Create web project and vpc proxy/configuration
Remove spring-web lib conflicting with spring-gateway, add debug apis
Add debug routing for vip manager health status
Fix connection issue to vpcmanager container and fix vpc url
vpc create api in api gateway

timeline.bodyText: does Java problem have "debug" mode as a compile option, maybe we can put the debug stuff under the "debug" mode?
timeline.author: er1cthe0ne

replies.bodyText: This 'debug' controller could be potentially used by the admin to get some extra information. I think we could use a better name like 'admin' instead of 'debug'.
replies.author: xieus

timeline.bodyText: we may also need the copy right header for test files.
timeline.author: er1cthe0ne
